description: Human heart is a muscular, four chambered pumping organ that circulates blood throughout the body.
heading: "Pericardium","Tricuspid valve","Pulmonary valve","Ventricle","Aortic valve","Systole","Diastole","Semilunar valves"
head_description: "A sac filled with serous fluid enclosing the heart.","Valve with three cusps. It is located between the right atrium and the right ventricle.","Semilunar valve located between right ventricle and pulmonary artery.","The thick-walled lower chamber of the heart.","Semilunar valve located between the left ventricle and the aorta.","The phase of the heartbeat when the heart contracts and pumps blood into the arteries.","The phase of the heartbeat when the heart relaxes and allows the chambers to fill with blood.","Either of two valves located at the opening of the aorta and at the opening of the pulmonary artery."
